entry.title: Silver Cowboy Hat Charm
entry.summary:
Vendor: Watchus
Type: Charm - Medium
Price: 6.00 - 13.50 (7 variants)

This is the perfect gift for all you cowboys and cowgirls. Saddle up your horse or pony and go for a ride with this hat with this Silver Cowboy Hat Charm.

C004S.  Silver Cowboy Hat Charm

Size: W:0.5 in/12.7 mm x H:0.7 in/17.78 mm  |  Weight: 1.9 g 
  • Sterling Silver Plated 100 Mils
  • Copyrighted
  • Three Dimensional
  • Made Right Here in The Northeast. Yup! U.S.A.
  • Charm Trail Favorite
  • Designed by Nancy Dreishpoon
